title: It appears that several residents in the porters neck area may be against the development of a walmart.  My question is:  Are there any official steps that residents can take to prevent development of land that is owned by a private party?
text:
About all neighbors can do to prevent a proposed development is to let
their elected officials know how they feel. Part of the tract would
have be rezoned, and the county commissioners will make the decision
whether to do that after the county Planning Board weighs in.
